turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Task 1: Booking a table

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, I'd like to book a table for tonight.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! And what time were you thinking of coming in this evening?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Do you have a table at 6pm?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Certainly! We can set that up for you at 6 p.m. this evening. Now, do you have any preference for indoor or outdoor seating?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And then we cast the outdoor setting.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, outdoor seating it is! I'll make sure we reserve a nice spot for you. And just to confirm, can I get a name for the booking?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, my name is Diana.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, Diana. We’ve got you all set for 6 p.m. outside. Just one last thing—do you have any dietary preferences or special requests for the meal?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No. Oh, I have something. I'm booking for my friend's birthday. Do you offer any singing or decoration?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We’d be happy to help with that. We can arrange a little birthday dessert and we can definitely sing a quick happy birthday if you'd like. Just let me know if that works for you.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you. Is this free?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! Yeah, that's absolutely free of charge. We’re happy to do that for a birthday celebration. So is there anything else we can do to make it special?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you. Can I ask one more?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! Go right ahead and ask anything else you need.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can we bring our own character for this elaboration?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, you can bring your own cake. We just ask that you let us know when you arrive, and we’ll help you out with it. Is there anything else you’d like to check?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Go to ISTEM menu online.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, it sure is! You can find our full menu right on our website. Feel free to take a look. And if you have any other questions, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So, do we have a vegetarian or halal option?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We do have both vegetarian and halal options available, so there's definitely something for everyone. Just let us know if you have any other special dietary needs!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: 텍스트 기록 사용할 수 없음

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure thing! Take your time. And if there's anything else you think of, just let me know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I order the food in advance?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, you can. We can take a preorder if you'd like, and that way everything will be ready when you arrive. So just let me know what dishes you're thinking of.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I will order a two pasta and is there any dessert?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: All right! I've got you down for two pasta dishes. And yes, we do have some lovely desserts as well. Would you like to hear a couple of options?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, sorry. What is a convolution?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! So for desserts, we've got a delicious chocolate lava cake and a classic tiramisu. Let me know which one sounds good to you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “It is delicious out of things. Can I order the two cakes you said?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! I'll add both the chocolate lava cake and the tiramisu to your order. So that should be all set. Anything else you need to add?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I change the booking?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, no problem at all. Just let me know what changes you'd like to make and we can adjust the booking for you.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I want to change it at 7 p.m.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I can do that for you. I'll switch your booking to 7 p.m. instead of 6. And is everything else still the same for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Could you confirm the time and the name, and the dishes for me?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! So just to confirm, we've got your booking under the name Diana for 7 p.m. tonight, with outdoor seating, two pasta dishes, and those two desserts we talked about. If that all sounds correct, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “ご視聴ありがとうございました。”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great! Then everything

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Awesome! You're all set for tonight at 7 p.m., Diana. If there's anything else you need, just let us know, and we look forward to seeing you.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, yes. Oh, can I ask you one more?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure thing! Feel free to ask me anything else you need.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is there any flexible if we are live 50 minutes late?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, there's a bit of flexibility. If you run about 15 minutes late, that's totally fine. Just give us a quick heads-up if you can, and we'll hold your table.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, sorry, I hear some noise, so can you tell me back again?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! So basically, if you arrive about 15 minutes late, that's no problem at all. Just let us know, and we’ll hold the table for you.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “What is it? How does it know?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, I just mean you can give us a quick heads-up if you're running late, so we know to keep your table. Let me know if that makes sense!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you for understanding me.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! You're very welcome. If there's anything else, just let me know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I guess that's all.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: All right, perfect! Well, thanks so much, and we look forward to having you tonight. Have a great day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, oh, what is your name?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! My name's Alex. So if you need anything when you arrive, just feel free to ask for me.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, thank you, Alex. See you evening tonight.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome, Diana. I'm glad I could help, and I hope you have a wonderful evening tonight.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're welcome! Enjoy your dinner and have a great time. Task 2: Ordering a coffee

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hello, how are you?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Doing great, thanks! So, let's figure out your coffee order. Did you have a particular size in mind for your coffee?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and larger size. Oh, which size do you have?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we can do a large for you. We've got a few sizes: typically a small, a medium, and a large. So for that large coffee, would you like any milk or sugar in it, or do you prefer it black?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can you show me the larger size cup?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure thing! So this here is our large cup—it’s about 16 ounces. It's nice and roomy, so plenty of space for whatever you like. Now, would you like to add any flavors or syrups in that coffee?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Please allow your stars, please.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Alright, large size it is! We'll get that going. And just to make sure we've got it right, do you want that coffee with any milk or are you keeping it black?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I get an iced vanilla latte, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! An iced vanilla latte in a large size coming right up. Now, just to check, would you like that with regular dairy milk or do you prefer a non-dairy alternative?

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Exactly! Just letting you pick whichever milk you prefer. So would you like regular milk, or maybe almond, oat, or soy?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “It's here. Lacto-free milk.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we do have lactose-free milk, so we can use that for your iced vanilla latte. And is there anything else you'd like to add to your order today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is there any dessert?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: For sure! We've got a few desserts you can pick from. We have things like muffins, cookies, and some slices of cake. Anything sweet sound good to you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, sorry, what did you say that's 3-tangent tube?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem at all! So we've got some muffins, cookies, and a couple of cake slices on the menu. Is there one of those that you'd like to add?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Recommended today. Forbidden.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! I'd say our chocolate chip muffins are pretty popular today. They’re fresh and really tasty. How does that sound for a little treat on the side?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, I will take out chocolate muffin, please, with my coffee.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We’ll add that chocolate muffin in with your iced vanilla latte. So, we've got everything set. Anything else I can get for you, or is that all for today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I ask more?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, go right ahead! I'm happy to answer anything else you need. What else would you like to know?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh yeah, thank you. And changing the milk is for free.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! And yes, actually, switching to lactose-free milk is no extra charge at all. So you're all set there. Anything else you're curious about?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and can you hit the feed?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, happy to help. We'll get that all sorted out for you. So, I’ll ring up your coffee and muffin. Thanks for your order!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, and can I get to work, please? Because my friend is coming here.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, no problem at all! We’ll make that two iced vanilla lattes with lactose-free milk and two chocolate muffins, then. We'll have everything ready for both of you. Anything else you need?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sorry, I did it, I said wrong before. I will order one iced vanilla latte and one chocolate muffin and can I get a more two chopstick?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Ah, got it! No worries at all. So just the one latte and muffin for you, and I'll make sure you have a couple of extra chopsticks. Anything else you need?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, yes. Oh, sorry. Can I change my coffee?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, no problem at all! We can change that up for you. What would you like to switch your coffee to?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I get one Iced long-black, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we'll swap that out for an iced long black instead. So one iced long black and one chocolate muffin it is. Anything else you’d like to adjust?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “How long will i take this.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: It'll just take a couple of minutes to get that iced long black ready for you. So you can just relax for a moment, and we'll have it out in no time. Anything else on your mind?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, no time is meaning, is no time meaning, is, uh, the, I can get up right now.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Exactly, you got it! "No time" just means it'll be really quick. So yeah, we'll have your coffee ready for you in just a moment. Anything else you want to ask about?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, it sounds good. How much is it?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! So for the iced long black and the chocolate muffin, that’ll come to about five dollars and fifty cents in total. Does that sound all right to you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, can I check my size one more?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, no problem at all. So your iced long black is in our large size cup, which is 16 ounces. Just let me know if that works for you or if you want to tweak anything else.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sounds good. Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! We'll get that all set up for you and have it ready in just a moment. Thanks a lot, and enjoy your coffee!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, thank you so much. Oh, what's your name?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! You’re welcome. I'm just your friendly barista here, so you can just think of me as your coffee helper today. If you need anything else, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, that's all.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: All right! Well, I'm glad we got everything sorted out for you. Thanks so much, and enjoy your order. If there's anything else in the future, just let me know. Have a great day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Have a great day too

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, take care and enjoy! Feel free to come back anytime.
